title: New progress file feature improvement
description: Implement improvements for the new progress file feature to enhance tracking and visibility of task progress.
acceptance_criteria: Progress can be queried and displayed

title: Symlink target not verified in _sync_symlinks_to_dir
description: In sync_commands.py line 237-240, when a symlink already exists, the code skips it without verifying it points to the correct target. If a symlink exists but points to the wrong file, it will remain incorrect.
acceptance_criteria: Existing symlinks are verified to point to correct targets
Incorrect symlinks are replaced with correct ones
Tests cover symlink target validation scenarios

title: Potential PyYAML document marker duplication
description: In sync_commands.py line 108-114, yaml.dump() may prefix output with --- document marker depending on content/version. This would create duplicate --- markers when _write_prompt_file adds its own delimiter.
acceptance_criteria: PyYAML output is checked for leading --- marker
Tests verify YAML front matter is correctly formatted

title: Remove redundant is_symlink() check in _cleanup_stale_symlinks
description: In sync_commands.py line 220-225, the is_symlink() check in the except OSError block is redundant since the loop at line 220 already filters for symlinks only.
acceptance_criteria: Redundant is_symlink() check is removed or clarified
